biolockj.util

Class MetaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.MetaUtil

  • public class MetaUtil
extends Object
    This utility is used to read, modify, or create a metadata file for the sequence data. The 1st row must hold the Sample ID and column names must be unique. Metadata information is cached in this class for quick access throughout the application.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String DEFAULT_COL_DELIM
      Default column delimiter = tab character
      protected static String DEFAULT_COMMENT_CHAR
      Default comment character for any new metadata file created by a BioModule: ""
      protected static String DEFAULT_NULL_VALUE
      Default field value to represent null-value: "NA"
      static String META_BARCODE_COLUMN
      Config property "metadata.barcodeColumn" defines metadata column with identifying barcode
      static String META_COLUMN_DELIM
      Config property that defines how metadata columns are separated: "metadata.columnDelim" Typically files are tab or comma separated.
      static String META_COMMENT_CHAR
      Config property to set metadata file comment indicator: "metadata.commentChar"
      Empty string is a valid option indicating no comments in metadata file
      static String META_FILE_PATH
      Config String property: "metadata.filePath"
      If absolute file path, use file as metadata.
      If directory path, must find exactly 1 file within, to use as metadata.
      static String META_FILENAME_COLUMN
      Config property "metadata.fileNameColumn" defines metadata column with input file names
      static String META_NULL_VALUE
      Config property to set metadata file empty cell: "metadata.nullValue"
      static String META_REQUIRED
      Config Boolean property: "metadata.required"
      If Y, require metadata row for each sample with sequence data in "input.dirPaths".
      If N, samples without metadata are ignored.
      static String USE_EVERY_ROW
      Config Boolean property: "metadata.useEveryRow"
      If Y, require a sequence file for every SampleID (every row) in "metadata.filePath".
      If N, metadata can include extraneous SampleIDs.

    • Method Detail

      • addColumn

        public static void addColumn(String colName,
                             Map<String,String> map,
                             File fileDir,
                             boolean removeMissingIds)
                      throws Exception
        Adds a column to the metadata file. The updated metadata file is output to the fileDir. Once the new file is created, the new file is cached in memory and used as the new metadata.
        Parameters:
        colName - Name of new column
        map - Map relates Sample ID to a field value
        fileDir - File representing output directory for new metadata file
        removeMissingIds - if TRUE, sampleIds not include in the map param will be removed from the metadata
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to add the new column

      • exists

        public static boolean exists()
        Determine if metadata file exists
        Returns:
        TRUE if metadata exists

      • fieldValuesAreUnique

        public static boolean fieldValuesAreUnique(String field,
                                           boolean ignoreNulls)
                                    throws Exception
        Determine if the given field has only unique values.
        Parameters:
        field - Metadata column
        ignoreNulls - if TRUE ignore duplicate "metadata.nullValue" values
        Returns:
        boolean if field values are unique
        Throws:
        Exception - if runtime errors occur

      • getField

        public static String getField(String sampleId,
                              String field)
                       throws Exception
        Get metadata field value for given sampleId.
        Parameters:
        sampleId - Sample ID
        field - Field Name (column name in metadata file)
        Returns:
        Metadata field value
        Throws:
        Exception - if parameters are invalid

      • getFieldNames

        public static List<String> getFieldNames()
                                  throws Exception
        Get a list of all metadata fields (metadata file column names except the 1st).
        Returns:
        List of metadata column names, excluding the 1st column
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to read metadata file

      • getFieldValues

        public static List<String> getFieldValues(String field,
                                          boolean ignoreNulls)
                                   throws Exception
        Get metadata column for given field name.
        Parameters:
        field - Column name
        ignoreNulls - if TRUE ignore duplicate "metadata.nullValue" values
        Returns:
        List of Column values for sample ID
        Throws:
        Exception - if metadata file or column name not found

      • getFile

        public static File getFile()
        Get the current metadata file. This path may change as updates are made by BioModules.
        Returns:
        Metadata file

      • getForcedColumnName

        public static String getForcedColumnName(String name)
                                  throws Exception
        Used to generate a guaranteed to be unique column name. If parameter "name" already exists, this will return name_1, or name_2, etc until an unused column name is found. If a column already exists, but contains only Config."metadata.nullValue" values, return the name of that empty column to overwrite.
        Parameters:
        name - Base column name
        Returns:
        Column name
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getID

        public static String getID()
        Get the metadata file ID column name. This value may change as updates are made by BioModules.
        Returns:
        Metadata ID column name

      • getLatestColumnName

        public static String getLatestColumnName(String name)
                                  throws Exception
        Returns the latest version of the given column.
        Parameters:
        name - Base column name
        Returns:
        column name
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getMetadata

        public static File getMetadata()
                        throws Exception
        Metadata file getter.
        Returns:
        Metadata file
        Throws:
        Exception - if any errors occur

      • getMetadataFileName

        public static String getMetadataFileName()
                                  throws Exception
        Get the metadata file name, if it exists, otherwise return projectName.tsv
        Returns:
        Name of metadata file, or a default name if no metadata file exists #throws Exception if errors occur
        Throws:
        Exception - if runtime errors occur

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Metadata row values for sample ID
        Throws:

        col - Column name

      • getUniqueFieldValues

        public static Set<String> getUniqueFieldValues(String field,
                                               boolean ignoreNulls)
                                        throws Exception
        Count the number of unique values in the given field.
        Parameters:
        field - Column header
        ignoreNulls - if TRUE ignore duplicate "metadata.nullValue" values
        Returns:
        Number of unique values
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • hasColumn

        public static boolean hasColumn(String columnName)
        Check if columnName exists in the current metadata file.
        Parameters:
        columnName - Column name
        Returns:
        TRUE if columnName exists in hearder row of metadata file

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
                       throws Exception
        Check dependencies used to handle the metadata file are defined and unique. For undefined properties we set the same default values as used by the R{utils} read.table() function.
        • "metadata.columnDelim" column separator
        • "metadata.commentChar" indicates start of comment in a cell, Requires length == 1
        • "metadata.nullValue" indicates null cell
        Throws:
        Exception - if invalid Config properties are detected

      • refreshCache

        public static void refreshCache()
                         throws Exception
        Refresh the metadata cache.
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to refresh cache

      • removeColumn

        public static void removeColumn(String colName,
                                File fileDir)
                         throws Exception
        Remove the metadata column from the metadata file
        Parameters:
        colName - Name of column to remove
        fileDir - File representing output directory for new metadata file
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • setFile

        public static void setFile(File file)
                    throws Exception
        Set a new metadata file.
        Parameters:
        file - New metadata file
        Throws:
        Exception - if null parameter is passed
